$comment: ## Array. Required. Nested array of categories with their subcategories for navigation.

categories.title: ## String. Required. The category name
categories._url_: ## String. Required. The url to this category
categories.$comment: ## Array. Required. Flat array of subcategories for this category.

sub_categories.title: ## String. Required. The category name
sub_categories._url_: ## String. Required. The url to this category

$comment: ## Array. Required. Flat array of posts for active_category.

posts.title: ## String. Required
posts._url_: ## String. Required. Url to this post
posts.published: ## String. Date this post was published

posts.title: ## String. Required
posts._url_: ## String. Required. Url to this post
posts.published: ## String. Date this post was published

load_more.title: ## String. Required. The text of the more button
load_more._url_: ## String. Required. The URL to API to grab more

load_back.title: ## String. Required. The text of the back button
load_back._url_: ## String. Required. The URL to API to grab previous

load_none.title: ## String. Required. The text of the end-of-posts-in-this-category button
load_none._url_: ## String. Required. The URL to API to grab previous
